I don't mean to cause any trouble, it is just that I'd rather not be bother=
ed having my inbox flooded with emails advertising this "New World Order" t=
hat they say will "revolutionize" Neo Beast Wars RPG.
  ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
  From: x_rauq_x 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, =
August 16, 2002 5:14 PM
  Subject: Re: 4 Life...


  ooC: Ok, nuff about wh=
ose faction is better. If you wanna toss 
  around poorly thought out comme=
nts, then please do so privately, and 
  spare us (everyone) the uneeded, e=
xtra emails.

  Also, nWo people, refrain from putting attachments along wi=
th your 
  emails. Not everyone has a fast connection, like cable. ^^


  -=
-- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@r...> wrote:
  > OOC:  Quite f=
rankly, the Rogues are way over-rated, and who are 
  you to call your smal=
l faction overmatching the nWo?  Guess what, 
  the nWo isn't at full stren=
gth yet.  And also, you know NOTHING 
  about the nWo, so therefore you are=
 not one to be talking.  The nWo

there are 8 characters being
